This campus is very safe.
I have not encountered a geek on this campus. Maybe they are lurking in the corners.
Many clubs and activities on this campus.
Students who want a strong Christian atmosphere. This campus is not uptight. It is very modern, up to date, and friendly yet holds to strong Christian values.
The Liberty Flames games are a sure hit on campus. Also, many concerts, political speakers, and other well known guests.

On-line classes are much more affordable than taking classes on campus. This is good for working students. Frazios in the area is a wonderful fast food italian restuarant. You wouldn't want to miss it!
There are many historical landmarks in Virginia and close to Lynchberg.
The dining halls are very good. Food is of high quality.
I have never experienced dorm life, but I hear it is very respectable.
This college rates high in academics. On-line courses are also offered for students out of state or who need a flexible schedule.
Make sure that a Christian college is what you are looking for. The college is very friendly, organized, and top rated.
Wonderful quality Christian education. Professors are very knowledgeable and up to date. I would highly recommend this college based on its high academics and high moral teaching.
